trans-unit.target: Pre-ceremony The hosts may ring their eternity bells to proceed.
The Procession The hosts may ring their eternity bells to proceed.
The Exchanging of Rings The hosts may ring their eternity bells to proceed.
The Reception The hosts may ring their eternity bells to bring proceedings to a close.
The reception will conclude shortly.
Ladies and gentlemen—and any others who may not fall into said categories!
I welcome you one and all to the Ceremony of Eternal Bonding, kupo!
Let us watch in silent reverence as <var 0A E802 /var> and <var 0A E803 /var> make their entrance into this most holy of halls.
Was that not the most beautiful thing you've ever seen? It was the most beautiful thing <var 1A 02 /var>I've<var 1A 01 /var> ever seen—and I've seen a lot of these, kupo!
If anything can top that entrance, it would probably be an emotional exchange of vows...
If our lovely couple would be so kind as to approach the dais for the ring exchange...
For what would a bonding ceremony be without a bond, er...band?

Ahem! <var 2C ((<var 0A E802 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here has toiled day and night, night and day─give or take a few days and nights─to create a truly <var 1A 02 /var>unique<var 1A 01 /var> symbol of <var 08 E4E80401 ((his)) ((her)) /var> devotion.
Ahem! <var 2C ((<var 0A E802 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has called upon a trusted companion to craft the ring <var 08 E4E80401 ((he)) ((she)) /var> brings today.
Ahem! <var 2C ((<var 0A E802 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has traveled the realm in search of the perfect ring with which to express <var 08 E4E80401 ((his)) ((her)) /var> devotion.
Ahem! <var 2C ((<var 0A E802 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> brings with <var 08 E4E80401 ((him)) ((her)) /var> a ring which is special in more ways than one.
And then we have <var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s ring.
And then we have <var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s ring.
And then we have <var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s ring.
And then we have <var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s ring.
Over hill and dale, across ocean and desert, through snowstorm and rain, over hill and...er...
The point is, kupo: our couple journeyed many malms to earn the blessings of the Twelve, proving their resolve in so doing!
And though the Sanctum somehow neglected to vest any official power in this humble choir moogle...
I'll gladly pronounce the two of you bonded for all eternity, kupo!
Come on, now─give them a nice round of applause! They've earned it, kupo!
The remainder of your time in the chapel is yours to fill however you wish. Just be careful not to spill any beverages on the carpets because it'll be muggins here who has to scrub that out, kupo!
I am pained to inform you that it is─as the jolly innkeepers put it─closing time.
You are, by no means, required to go home...
Let us shower our good friends with joy, happiness, and inexpensive party goods─available from our own outfitters─as they step out of this blessed sanctuary and into their new lives!
Welcome dear friends and loved ones.
We are gathered here today to join two kindred souls in holy union.
<var 0A E802 /var> and <var 0A E803 /var>.
Here, in the presence of gods and men, they shall take a solemn oath to endure all future trials as one. Supporting the other, should they falter. Guiding the other, should they lose their way.
Therefore, this binding of two souls, which is commended to be honorable amongst all, must not be entered into lightly, but with sincerity and reverence.
While none may deny the spiritual bond 'twixt hearts intertwined, the gods do ask that a symbol be offered─a token to serve as a tangible reminder of the promise made.
Let us raise up these tokens of our couple's commitment, that the Twelve might pass judgment upon them.
<var 2C ((<var 0A E802 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─like the Builder Himself, you have embraced creation, and with thine own hands fashioned a ring the likes of which none have heretofore seen.

<var 2C ((<var 0A E802 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─Menphina teaches us that our worth is measured not only by the love we receive, but by the love we give. The ring you bring today serves as a testament to that love.
<var 2C ((<var 0A E802 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─as the Traders teach, our lives are an everlasting circle of exchange, not unlike the ring for which you have bartered.
<var 2C ((<var 0A E802 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─like the path of the Wanderer, some roads are more winding than first they appear. Such is the road your ring has taken.
<var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─the Scholar provides us with such knowledge as would allow us to bend the world to our will. You have used this knowledge to create a ring most wondrous.

<var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─the Warden embraces all truths, yet She values none more highly than the truth which two friends share. Verily, the ring you have brought today is a true symbol of friendship.
<var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The Navigator guides us all unto that which we seek. Thus did you happen upon this ring.

<var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As the Spinner weaves our fates, so too does She weave the fates of all creation. The ring you have brought for your partner was meant for this day from the first.
Though fraught with peril, the journey our couple embarked upon to see their rings blessed has brought them closer than they could e'er imagine.
Never will they forget the trials they overcame together. Never will they forget the bonds they forged.
By the power vested in me by the gods on high...
I now pronounce you bonded for eternity!
Now, dear friends, let us give the happy couple a warm round of applause!
Please use your remaining time in the Ivory Chapel as you wish.
Plead as we might, the Keeper stalls the hands of time for no soul.
And so with this we must bring today's ceremony to a close.
A journey that will see <var 2C ((<var 0A E802 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and <var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> to places that they never imagined.
Greetings friends. Your presence at this joyous occasion is much appreciated.
Without further ado, let us see our couple to the dais.
Enter, <var 0A E802 /var>, <var 0A E803 /var>.
Those gathered here today shall serve as witnesses to this sacred bond.
So that none may ever deny it.
And what tokens of loyalty and companionship do these two offer each other?
What symbols of affection will they carry with them always in their hearts and on their hands?
<var 2C ((<var 0A E802 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has toiled long to craft this flawless band.
<var 2C ((<var 0A E802 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> oversaw the creation of this flawless band.
<var 2C ((<var 0A E802 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has brought today this flawless band.
<var 2C ((<var 0A E802 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> presents this special ring and the untold history it carries.
<var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has called upon <var 08 E4E80501 ((his)) ((her)) /var> inner talents to forge <var 08 E4E80501 ((his)) ((her)) /var> partner's ring.
<var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has called upon a trusted companion to create <var 08 E4E80501 ((his)) ((her)) /var> partner's ring.
<var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has reached deep to procure <var 08 E4E80501 ((his)) ((her)) /var> partner's ring.
<var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has chosen this unique band for reasons known only to <var 08 E4E80501 ((he and his)) ((she and her)) /var> partner alone.
The challenges our couple faced to prepare the rings for this day were not without peril.
Yet they overcame each and every obstacle hand in hand as one.
By the authority granted me by the Sanctum of the Twelve...
I now pronounce you bonded for eternity.
Let us congratulate the newly bonded couple with a heartfelt round of applause.
The time remaining in the Ivory Chapel is your own. Feel free to celebrate this momentous occasion in any manner you see fit.
While I know none could wish the end of such a spectacular day...
The Sanctum must ready its hallowed halls for another.
Now let us bid farewell to our friends as they set out not as two, but as one.
Have all preparations been completed?
Yes
No
<var 0A E802 /var> and <var 0A E803 /var>...
With the exchange of rings, you will enter a pact not lightly broken.

Ceremony Setting Confirmation
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The ceremony will automatically begin 20 minutes after settings have been finalized.
The eternity bell may be used to commence the ceremony early, but please ensure all parties have arrived before doing so.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Select whose settings are to be used:
Your own
Your partner's
Cancel
Proceed to the next stage of the ceremony?
Conclude the ceremony?
Our most lovely couple.
Honored couple...
If you are both ready, let us not linger here overlong.
If anything can top that entrance, it would probably be an emotional exchange of vows...
Therefore, this bonding of two souls, which is commended to be honorable amongst all, must not be entered into lightly, but with sincerity and reverence.
So that none may ever deny it.
...which, as luck would have it, our couple has prepared for us all! You <var 1A 02 /var>have<var 1A 01 /var> prepared some...right?

If there is any person here present who might show just cause as to why this couple should not be so joined, let them speak now or forever hold their peace. If there is none, then allow our couple to read aloud their prepared vows.
However, before we proceed to the exchanging of rings, I shall allow the couple a moment to read their vows.
...which I'm assuming you've prepared...right?
As there are none here present who might show just cause as to why the two of you should not be bound unto one another, you may proceed to read aloud your prepared vows.
However, before we proceed to the exchanging of rings, I shall allow you a moment to read your vows.
If there is another like it in the entire realm, it is purely by coincidence!
For <var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s sake, let us hope <var 08 E4E80401 ((he)) ((she)) /var> doesn't trust that companion <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> much, kupo!
And by divine providence, they were not sold out, kupo!
So special, in fact, that <var 08 E4E80401 ((he)) ((she)) /var> wouldn't even tell me why, kupo!
Crafted with <var 08 E4E80501 ((his)) ((her)) /var> own two hands─each strike of the chaser hammer a declaration of everlasting faith, kupo!
Crafted by a fellow adventurer under <var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s strict supervision, kupo.
A dazzling specimen that could not have been easy to come by, kupo.
A ring whose deep personal significance is probably better explained by <var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> <var 08 E4E80501 ((him)) ((her)) /var>self, kupo.
And of this token, the Twelve approve.
And of this token, the Twelve approve.
And of this token, the Twelve approve.
And of this token, the Twelve approve.
And of this token, the Twelve approve.
And of this token, the Twelve approve.
And of this token, the Twelve approve.
And of this token, the Twelve approve.
And with it pledges devotion undying.
And with it pledges faith unmoving.
And with it signifies <var 08 E4E80401 ((his)) ((her)) /var> commitment to provide for <var 08 E4E80401 ((his)) ((her)) /var> partner, no matter the cost.
And with it pledges dedication unyielding.
And with it pledges loyalty untainted.
And with it pledges trust unwavering.
And with it pledges a commitment unbending.
And with it pledges conviction unending.
And so long as these symbols of your shared bond endure, none may deny the legitimacy of the rites performed here this day.
May they be reminded of that journey whenever they gaze upon these sacred bands. Or into each other's eyes. Or at a moogle, for that matter, kupo!
And with that, all that remains now is to seal the pact...
...with a kiss─amongst other things, kupo!
With this exchange, these two souls shall pledge themselves to one another, and in the eyes of the Twelve be ever joined in one unbroken circle.
Now, <var 2C ((<var 0A E802 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and <var 2C ((<var 0A E803 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...
Step forward and complete the rites of ring and cup.
You both made it through in one piece! And that's more than I can say for those bomb-happy goblins I presided over last week, kupo!
You must feel a great weight has been lifted from your shoulders.
And allow me to be the first to offer my personal congratulations.
May they live happily ever after, kupo!
May the Twelve watch over them forever and always.
The world may not have changed, but from this day forth, nothing will ever be the same.
The Exchanging of Vows The hosts may ring their eternity bells to proceed.
But you cannot stay here, kupo!
We thank you one and all for accompanying us on these first steps of a fabulous new journey.
Thank you all once again for serving as witnesses to this bonding of souls.
I hope to see neither of you again...if you know what I mean, kupo!
Today was the first step in a never-ending journey.
You have endured much and more as individuals to arrive at this day.
Follow the White Rabbit
Vitiated Aether Crystal Yield
The happy bunny stares up at you, twitching its nose eagerly. Perhaps it wishes to thank you.
The happy bunny seems rather pleased with itself for having helped you find the treasure.
O mighty Odin─forlorn hero! In thy hallowed name, I shall strike at the wicked empire!

O lamentable queen, for love a stone become! Thy tears shall drown mine enemies!
The hammer of justice shall smash the wicked empire!
●半面斬鉄剣準備（本気モード）
O deadly blade, quenched in unsullied tears! Bring thy true might to bear!
●真・斬鉄剣発動直前（要求DPS高）
●真・斬鉄剣詠唱が中断（要求DPS高）
I am the bearer of Orlasrach, spear of the night. Together with my twin, I shall smite all trespassers.
I am the bearer of Munderg, spear of the morning. Standing with my twin, I shall destroy our foes.
The end is nigh! Orlasrach, pierce their very souls!
The reckoning cometh! Munderg, ring their death knells!
O spear unyielding, become thee a thousand soldiers!
O spear unrelenting, partake of mine essence and unleash my fury!
Munderg, turn flesh to ash!
Munderg, turn blood to ice!
Arrive at one of the first two containment units
Clear one of the first two containment units
Arrive at the Shin-Zantetsuken Containment Unit
Clear the Shin-Zantetsuken Containment Unit
Arrive at the Lance of Virtue Containment Unit
Clear the Lance of Virtue Containment Unit
Arrive at the Proto Ozma Containment Unit
Defeat Proto Ozma
Conquer the Baldesion Arsenal
Unstable Aetherial Node
Stable Aetherial Node
Tell me...for what sssearchest thou, to travel this far?
Show me...by what principlesss art thou driven?
My thoughtsss, my memoriesss...are mine once more. For thee, I shall sing the sssong of destruction.
By thy principlesss...I am freed from the chainsss placed upon me since time immemorial.
This is test subject VIII, Dabog. Target confirmed. Removing safety locks.
Updating target assessment. Switching to secondary attack routine.
This is test subject VIII, Dabog. Gabriel activation complete. Commencing attack.
Analyzing target behavior. Ascertaining potential weaknesses.
Target continues to resist elimination. Assigning all processing power to target analysis.
Target continues to resist elimination. Does not compute. Does not compute.
Damage sustained has exceeded acceptable limits. Retreating to prevent seizure of technology by enemy forces.
This is test subject VIII, Dabog. Target silenced. Returning to base.
Look, Akbaba! Your prey has arrived!
Akbaba! Envelop them in slicing winds!
Send them sprawling!
Come to me!
Time to end this, Akbaba!
No! Akbaba, are you hurt!?
Akbaba... I have failed you.
Close...so close... I hunger...
What manner of fiend is this!? No matter, the monoceros will purify its wicked soul!
The monoceros will expel this hateful aura! We must draw these apparitions to the center!
Not this again... Monoceros, one more time!
You must be the one I've heard so much about. Let's see if there's any truth to the rumors!
They say you got the better of Zenos himself. Judging by what I've seen so far, I find that hard to believe!
Perhaps you are a cut above the rest after all!
Haha! I haven't had this much fun in years!
Don't tell me you've had enough already!
It seems you were all you're cracked up to be. Consider me impressed!
This round goes to you. I'll look forward to going toe-to-toe with you again!
Is that all you've got? Makes me wonder what all the fuss was about.
We're done here. Back to the castrum!
In the name of the IVth Legion and Sadr rem Albeleo, we shall slay you wretched Bozjans!
Do not be disheartened, men! This is far from over!
Let us see how you fare against our pyroboli!
Everyone, divert your aether to the pyrobolus! We'll blast those Resistance swine to the seventh hell!
Activating weapon systems. Magitek bartizan operational.
Deploying timed mines. All friendly units are requested to clear the area.
Oh, how I have waited for this moment. Let us see whose flame burns brightest!
At last, a worthy foe! Now, you shall witness my true power!
Hahaha! I shall sear the flesh from your bones!
Unnngh... I must conserve aether.
Haaa...haaa... I am not through with you yet, savage!
My flames...extinguished? How can this be!?
All in all, a poor display. How disappointing.
Deploy reflector bits! I wonder, can the test subject calculate the trajectory of a beam of light?
While the Dáinsleif has performed below expectations, the data obtained is valuable indeed.
UNIDENTIFIED RECRUITS DETECTED. BOOTING BASIC TRAINING PROTOCOL.
BASIC TRAINING PROTOCOL LOADED. COMMENCING DRILL PROGRAM.
BOOTING ENDURANCE TRAINING.
RECRUITS FAILING TO MEET STANDARD ENDURANCE RATING WILL BE PUNISHED.
COMMENCING FINAL ASSESSMENT. BOOTING ANNIHILATION MODE.
RECRUITS FAILING TO FOLLOW ORDERS WILL BE TERMINATED.
CALIBRATE VITALS TO MULTIPLES OF 3.
CALIBRATE VITALS TO MULTIPLES OF 4.
CALIBRATE VITALS TO MULTIPLES OF 5.
CALIBRATE VITALS TO PRIMES.
RECRUITS FAILING TO FOLLOW ORDERS DETECTED. BOOTING PUNISHMENT PROTOCOL.
SYSTEM DAMAGE: 95%. ENTERING SAFE MODE... ABORTING BASIC TRAINING PROTOCOL...
Look on my works, ye mighty, and despair!
From your shattered corse, I shall craft a monument to agony!
May the lightning tear through you! Let your dying screams fill the air!
I have to hand it to you, I never thought you'd make it this far. I'm going to enjoy this...
Go, Dawon! Your prey awaits!
That's it. Just like I taught you!
Not bad! This calls for something special!
I can't let you lot have all the fun. Why not come over here and let me take a swing?
Scared, eh? I reckon cowards like you are hardly worth my time, anyway!
If you won't make a move, then I will!
Nothing like a good scrap to get the blood pumping!
Haha! A challenge, at last!
Steady on! No need to get carried away!
Well, as enjoyable as it's been, it's time I called it quits.
Get up! I'm not finished with you yet!
Come back when you've toughened up! I'll be waiting.
Not quite what I had in mind. Dawon, let's try that again!
You'd better not mess it up this time!
Spirits of the dead... Your hatred is mine to command!
This bodes ill. Does anyone have some sort of curative magick!?
I...can't go on... Promise me you'll...keep the monoceros safe.
Nooo! Not after all we've been through!
The eale has been...cowed!? Forward, golems! Assist him!
The tunnel armor will breach their defenses. It's up to us to keep it in one piece until it's through!
We'll split into two groups: one to lay siege from the outside, while the other scales the wall!
Brionac has fallen!? Quickly, deploy reinforcements!
I knew those helldivers were a waste of time! Send reinforcements─ some proper soldiers!
Have you finished preparing the artillery? Then what are you waiting for!? Fire!
Haha! We're through the wall! But we mustn't get complacent. It's not over yet.
Storm the castrum! Everyone, forward!
We can't give these durs another ilm. Take no prisoners! Kill every last one of them!
That's Albeleo. He's a crafty one─watch out for his spells!
Enough of this! Hit them with everything we have!
Now's our chance! Attack!
They leave me with no choice. The day has come to demonstrate the power of the auracite!
Close the barricade! I need more time!
Retreat! Retreat! Burn all documents, execute the prisoners!
It seems he's eluded us, for now, at least. We'll need to get past that barricade.
Everyone, split up and search for a way to open it!
A number of our countrymen were taken captive. They're likely being held somewhere in the castrum.
It's open! Continue to the inner reaches!
Someone's there! Wait, is that...?
You fools...what have you done? Gabranth would see Bozja reborn, yet you would bare your steel against him!?
By denying the path of righteousness, you have sealed your fate. The heavens have spoken, and they are wroth indeed!
So this is what it is to be a god.
I am Adrammelech... Now know regret, a sinner's recompense.
To think he would go to such lengths, to surrender himself body and soul to that devil.
There's no time to dwell on that. We must press on!
Protect the tunnel armor.
Storm Castrum Lacus Litore.
Find a way to open the barricade.
Freed prisoners
Clear the airship landing.
Clear Majesty's Auspice.
Combat functions compromised. Abandoning warmachina.
The crack of lightning, the roar of flame, The rumble of earth, the grip of ice, The rush of water, the howl of wind. At their center, I stand. Alone and omnipotent.
This is test subject VIII, Dabog. Target sighted.
I need a good scrap to clear the cobwebs!
Who will be next to fuel my flame?
The tunnel armor is under attack! Strike the enemy's core!
Keep those helldivers away from the tunnel armor!
It's beginning to crack!
It's working! It's working!
We're almost there! Just a little longer!
I tire of your impudence. Now, I shall reduce you to ash, bones and all!
What's that supposed to be!? A shameful display if ever I saw one.
Helldivers! We must guard the tunnel armor from them at all costs!
More helldivers, coming in fast! Quickly, get rid of them!
Operational time limit exceeded. Firing all armaments.
Not another step closer! Time to show you what the IVth Legion's made of!
Is there no end to them!?
They've finally run out of soldiers to throw at us, it seems. Forward!
Careful now. Something's not right. Be on your guard.
Our efforts will all be for naught if the tunnel armor fails now. Do whatever it takes to defend it!
Dawon! Are you enjoying this as much as I am?
Clear the Barracks and Granary
Clear the Theater of One
Clear the Hall of Supplication
Clear the Hall of Hieromancy
Clear Pride of the Lion
Clear the Vault of Singing Crystal
Clear Queensheart
Clear the Path of Divine Clarity
Extraordinary... To think such vast ruins could endure underground for all these years. I pray we can find Misija before it's too late.
Is that...!? Heavens forfend. Careful, everyone!
I care not for this strange energy emanating from the floor...
Have these creatures always lived down here, I wonder...? I wish we did not have to fight, but I fear they leave us little choice.
It would seem they are intent on blocking our path.
If they were placed here to protect Save the Queen, then Misija must be ahead. Quickly!
Spirits!? Even in death they are denied solace... Let us lay them to rest!
Have care where you step. I sense more foul magicks nearby.
Careful. There may yet be more traps here.
Another of the tempered Blades... Gods, what has Misija done?
These ruins are endless. Where could she be?
We are the Blades of the Verdant Path. Three who fight as one. All who trespass must be purged, in the name of the queen!
The Verdant Path...? Then this amalgamation of aether I sense is... Oh no!
Submit, that we might offer you a merciful end.
You would forgo our mercy? Then suffer by our baleful blade!
We shall break you with fists of iron!
I... I recognize their─I mean, its aether. But how could this be?
Before our blade, you are nothing.
It's too late for you!
Hyah!
A futile endeavor.
There is no need to fear the inevitable.
You have never seen a blade like <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>!
Three...as one. Now and...forever...more...
This is far worse than I feared. I have read of the prolonged effects of tempering, but a fusion of bodies and spirits...?
Halt! By order of Queen Gunnhildr, the punishment for trespassing is death!
Are they too under the influence of Save the Queen? I suppose we have no choice but to fight.
You shall perish long before our defenses are breached.
This does not bode well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We have to stop them!
Fall back! Fall back! The queen cannot be left unguarded!
Death to those who dare defy the queen. So it is decreed, and so it shall be!
More souls made thrall to Misija and Queen Gunnhildr... Why did it come to this?
A ruin of ice and fire upon thee!
Its magicks have destabilized our thermoregulatory─ Ahem... We must return our body temperatures to normal.
You doubt our power!? Behold...!
Perhaps these aetherial agglomerations can help us. If you feel overly hot or cold, seek one whose temperature is an opposing extremity.
Struggle if that is your wont, but our power shall not be denied!
The queen's decree must needs be fulfilled! We will bathe this chamber in flames if we must!
Bathed in flame!? Fall back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
I have you now!
The aether of this chamber has grown erratic. Careful─those arrows are not what they seem.
Very well... Perhaps you would rather fall by our sword.
Its magicks have warped the blade somehow...
No matter the cost, you must be dealt with.
Like animals to slaughter, we shall cut you down.
Surrender now and perhaps we will show mercy.
Let our magick become flesh, a redoubtable vessel to fulfill the queen's will!
We...have failed... Our duty... Our queen...
Hurry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We must put an end to this. For their sakes...
I am Gunnhildr... I am queen! Bozja is mine to rule, now and forevermore!
She's become a vessel for the blades' power... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I'm afraid she must be slain. There is no other way.
Lady of blades, bring forth my betrayers. Purify their hearts, and return them to glory!
Hearken now to the clarion call of war! The time for battle has come.
Prepare yourself, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. She compels them to march.
Lady of blades, I beseech you─grant me the strength to overcome our oppressors! To reclaim what is rightfully ours!
As strange as this may sound, I suspect we must march as well if we mean to avoid coming to harm.
Come, my subjects. Protect your queen!
エーテルを凝縮している……！？ 障害となるテンパードたちを、排除しなければ……！
Never again shall Bozja come to harm. I will not allow it!
Mine is the just path. The <var 1A 02 /var>righteous<var 1A 01 /var> path! And I will not suffer a second betrayal!
Are you all right, everyone?
My word is law! My will is absolute!
聖剣にエーテルが充填されています！ 大技に警戒してください！
To me, my subjects!
Do not be fooled by his illusions! Look closely, and you will see the truth of their stratagems.
March, my subjects. Your queen commands it!
Enough of this mummery.
Intruders! Get out! GET OUT!!!
Die! Die! DIE!!!
Why...won't...you...
Who dares disturb our slumber?
At last... Our souls...may rest...
Intruders not welcome. Intruders leave. Or die!
Graaagh! Not...welcome... Leave...or...
Intruders suffer! Intruders despair!
Curse intruders!
You think yourself beyond judgment!?
How can this be!? No... No, I will not let it end like this!
Enacting the queen's will in 10 seconds...
Enacting the queen's will in 5 seconds...
Enacting the queen's will in 4 seconds...
Enacting the queen's will in 3 seconds...
Enacting the queen's will in 2 seconds...
Enacting the queen's will in 1 second...
Your queen has spoken. Now, march!
Dire consequences await those who defy me.
You would feign to understand our suffering!? Our pain!? You shall long for something as sweet as pain!
5 seconds remain to follow the queen's will...
4 seconds remain to follow the queen's will...
3 seconds remain to follow the queen's will...
2 seconds remain to follow the queen's will...
1 second remains to follow the queen's will...
Oh, how I will enjoy pulling your strings.
I can feel my power growing! <var 1A 02 /var>Spreading<var 1A 01 /var>! Hahaha, soon my traps will be sprung!
Warning: Central control system failure. Warni─<bzzzt> <var 1A 02 /var>I return to myself at last<var 1A 01 /var>!
You shall never be free from the terror of my weaving!
The gates must be opened! The energies of the nether must flow free once more!
Drown in the embrace of night everlasting!
Flames from the bowels of the void shall lick at your heels.
Hearken to me, wayward souls of the black. Make known your misery!
Your frail, feeble flesh belies such sumptuous souls. I must have them! I must have them all!
No! Something is wrong... My body, it─<bzzzt> Corruption detected in spectral data. Readying emergency system purge.
...No! I will not─ <bzzzt> Reactors reaching critical mass. Rebooting system...
Central control system online─ <bzzzt> Nooo─ <bzzzt> Corrupted data...successfully...purged...
My life is but a pittance for victory.
To maintain order, one must first have control.
None can stand before my unyielding blade.
Good to see you're still alive and kicking. At least for a while longer, at any rate.
Only one of us is walking away from this. I plan to make sure of that!
Not bad. You at least know your way around a weapon.
C'mon now, you're starting to disappoint.
Not getting tired, are you? I'm just warming up!
That certainly got the blood flowing. Well fought.
I'd love to continue this bout of fisticuffs, but duty calls! Don't worry, though─you haven't seen the last of me.
That was it? You had me all worked up for nothing.
Ugh, why do I even bother with you would-be heroes... Everyone, back to the ship!
So you are the <var 1A 02 /var>liberator<var 1A 01 /var> of whom the people speak... Come. I would take your measure.
罠を仕掛けさせてもらった。 よもや、卑怯などとは言うまいな……？
You've your wits about you, I see. Very good.
I was admittedly alarmed when I heard you bested Lyon. Alas, it would seem your reputation was overstated.
Were you holding back? ...I suppose it doesn't matter.
Argh... It is clear now how you bested Lyon.
I'll know better than to underestimate you next time.
Perhaps there is some merit to the claims of your prowess.
You are strong, yes... But not strong enough.
No harm must come to the great wolf!
Everyone, lend him your energies!
Target identified. Ready to engage!
Scanning target for vulnerabilities...
Target appears...unharmed! Requesting assistance! I repeat, requesting assistance!
Be careful. The air reeks of death here.
The monoceros can cleanse you of her maledictions. Quickly, step into the purifying light.
Hernais? Dyunbu? Gods, what has he done to you...?
Readying dispersed assault sequence.
Transmission protocols active... Submitting request for reinforcements.
Resubmitting request for reinforcements... Altering attack pattern!
Activating emergency protocols. Combat regulators disabled!
There they are! Another fine opportunity to test my prototypes.
Now to put that combat data from Gaius to work...
That should suffice for rudimentary testing. Now for more advanced combat formations.
Readying the satellite link and preparing to fire.
Hmmm... More rigorous testing may be in order.
It is clear we have underestimated the enemy. Time for my last prototype.
The Bozjan Resistance ends here!
Fall back, Menenius. I can take it from here.
Hope you weren't planning to keep <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> all to yourself. We still have a score to settle from the castrum.
Stubborn to a fault, as ever. Fine. Let us be about it, then.
Lyon, to me! Hurry!
Watch your tone, boy! No need to rush. Now, where were we?
Perhaps if they could be divided...
Aye, I get you.
No, no, no! We have come too far for it to end this way!
Divide into two groups and drive back the IVth Legion
Infiltrate the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var>
Clear Magitek Development
Divide into three groups and disable the barricade
Reach the greater hold
Clear the greater hold
Defeat the Diablo Armament
If we are to have any hope of lowering the ship's gangplank, we must send a small unit of soldiers to slip past their defenses.
Indeed. I should think no more than eight, lest they draw attention. We will do what we can to keep the imperials distracted, meanwhile the detachment must take the star chasers and steal inside.
The main force must press onward. We also need one unit down the left and right corridors.
You have come far, rebels, but no further.
I have at last unraveled the mysteries of auracite, you see, and I require an audience to my next great work...
Hahaha! Surprised, are we?
Yes, scream for me! I would hear every whimper, every cry─unto your dying wails of agony!
I both pity and fear the man who might covet the terrible power of auracite.
I can but wonder what horrors yet await us...
For a blessing, our detachments continue to hold fast against the enemy. Let us press onward.
At last, the path is clear!
There is still no sign of this Allagan relic.
Nor of their commander... We mustn't let down our guard. He could be upon us at any moment.
I must confess, you Bozjan savages are a clever lot, managing to wreak havoc on our engines.
But cheap tricks will not save you this time.
Welcome to the proving grounds for the latest and greatest of my magitek creations!
I-Impossible! ...Ugh, there are far better uses of my time than this. The others should prove more than enough to deal with you.
I expected more of his magitek toys. Pity...
Sartauvoir has taken care of matters on his end, like as not, meaning I should hurry and do the same here.
The flames of Mannatheihwo will reduce you to ash, one and all!
For...forgive me... Sartauvoir...
Well, well, you managed to beat back the flames.
Fine by me. Our pets could do with a little sport.
How...? How could this happen!?
Mark me, savages: you <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> pay for this!
Aha, so it was you who thought to sneak inside. Well, this suits me just fine.
I'm afraid time is not on your side, friend, for it bends to my will!
It seems you truly do live up to your reputation.
But you've not won yet. I will offer my soul to the fires, if I must. Become flames made flesh!
Ugh... I mustn't succumb to the flames. Not yet... I'll not sully his memory by giving up now!
If this is where I must die, I will not do so alone! Basch! I pray you are watching!
Legatus Basch taught me well, as you will now see. I pour my all into this blade, kissed by the flames of Mannatheihwo!
The flames have been...extinguished.
Intruder alert! Intruder alert! Defense systems have been activated!
Damn it! Stay sharp, everyone!
Enemy reinforcements! To arms!
Oi! How many times do I have to teach this lesson, <var 08 E905 ((girl)) ((boy)) /var>? When I put you down, you <var 1A 02 /var>stay<var 1A 01 /var> down!
Quit playing around, Menenius, and follow my lead!
<sigh> If you insist...
Energy levels at maximum... Engage!
Is this the best the Resistance can offer? Pathetic!
Priority target...acquired! Destroy!
Deploy replicants... Prepare to fire!
Heavy damage sustained... Systems critical!
Weapons charged to maximum... Initiating execution protocol!
Sys...tem... Fail...ure...
Priority target eliminated... Mission complete.
That's quite far enough.
Let the fires burn so hot as to set their souls aflame!
By a confluence of water and wind shall we smite the Resistance.
Let none doubt the power of the IVth's cadre of mages!
Hold nothing back, brothers and sisters!
O Hanbi, bringer of ruin, we offer unto you these wayward warriors. Their blood to stay your thirst, their souls your hunger.
Death comes to all who stand in your shadow, and we ask you cast it now over those who would trespass against us.
I see you've found my cavaliers, good. A fine opportunity to test the battle capabilities of the clibanarius.
This is absurd... Surround them, and let the scorpion finish them off!
Surely they're no match for both the satellite and the scorpion in tandem?
This shouldn't be happening... Ready the death machines, with as much ammunition as they can carry!
We yet remain unscathed, though I honestly cannot say how. Now, we wait for the others to do their part.
He would turn us into monsters as well! On your guard, everyone!
You've arrived at last...
I'm releasing aether from my armor's core. Take it, Lyon! I'll not have you bowing out just yet.
Dawon! I need you to feed some aether into that toy of his. We still need him for this!
The liberator come to cut the head off the snake. How brave...yet foolish.
The security system appears to be linked between these two corridors.
If it is to be disabled, no doubt we must do so from both sides. Let us make haste.
Dawon, no! Damn it all!
Bah! Incompetent, the lot of you! Send in the colossi! They mustn't be allowed any further!
But...the auracite! How could you...gaaaaaah!
Activate the gangplank
Gilded Cactuars
Silver Cactuars
Bronze Cactuars
Jump to the finish!
<var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it looks like <var 0A E802 /var> decided to visit!
Guess what, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! <var 0A E802 /var> is here!
<var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, a structure has been completed! You need but access the appropriate logboard to give it a final inspection!
